CustomField.description: In the corporate currency, the amount of revenue that is scheduled for recognition within the relevant time period for the EVA revenue source, when using the Deliverable recognition method.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: In the corporate currency, the amount of revenue that is scheduled for recognition within the relevant time period for the EVA revenue source, when using the Deliverable recognition method.
CustomField.label: Corp: Deliverable: EVA: Scheduled
